food.name: Чай, чай масала, крепкий, соевое молоко (соевые бобы)

serves.comment:
This serving size contains high amounts of FODMAPs. Intake may trigger symptoms if you malabsorb any of the indicated FODMAPs.

This serving is made from 1 teabag infused to a strong strength (3-5 minutes), with 1 tablespoon of milk or milk alternative. Note: caffeine, when consumed in excess, can be an additional symptom trigger.
serves.title: 1 порция (250 мл)
